allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
docs: archive completed build phase (2025-10-16)

Following project''s date-based archival philosophy:

Changes:
- Create docs/archive/1-build-completed-2025-10-16/
- Move IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md to archive
- Add BUILD_COMPLETE.md with build summary
- Update DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md to reflect archive
- Remove empty docs/1-build/ directory

Rationale:
- Build phase is complete, archive for historical reference
- Follows YYYY-MM-DD pattern used throughout project
- Clear state transition: Build → Complete → Archived
- Focus documentation on active phases (0-start, 2-use, 3-extend)

Archive contains:
- Complete build guide (all 8 phases)
- Build completion summary
- Validation results
- Session history (12 commits, phases 4-8)

Build status: ✅ All phases complete and tested
Next steps: See docs/0-start/ and docs/2-use/
EOF
)")
